Version 2.0.94 - Fix Suspend Data Corruption + Resume Format for iSpring/Rise 360

Bug Fixes

  • Fix iSpring LZ-String backward navigation corruption: modifySuspendDataForSlide now detects Storyline signature before applying Storyline-specific regexes; non-Storyline LZ+Base64 data (iSpring) is left unmodified
  • Fix parseSlideFromSuspendData misinterpreting iSpring LZ data: extractSlideFromText regex patterns only run on confirmed Storyline decompressed data
  • Fix iSpring Base64 / Rise 360 refresh resume: pre-init lesson_location correction was gated behind suspend_data modification success; now always corrects lesson_location independently (SCORM 1.2 + 2004)
  • Fix format mismatch on resume: read interceptor now corrects numeric DB values ("5") to vendor format ("slide_5", "section_4") using lastKnownLocationFormat even when slide number matches furthestSlide

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.93: Fix iSpring LZ-String position tracking + persist location format for resume
  • v2.0.92: Fix resume format for iSpring/Rise 360 + Storyline retry backing store correction
  • v2.0.91: Fix Storyline resume + remaining parseInt issues for iSpring/Rise 360
  • v2.0.90: Fix position bar counter for iSpring/Rise 360 and Captivate
